title: AUO showcases 480Hz displays for laptops and monitors
content:
If you thought 360Hz gaming monitors were overkill for the majority of people, display manufacturer AUO has something that might surprise you. During the SID 2022 Display Week (which is this week), AUO showed off a range of new displays it’s working on (first spotted by ComputerBase), including two panels with a whopping 480Hz refresh

The post AUO showcases 480Hz displays for laptops and monitors appeared first on XDA.
description: AUO's latest display technology promises to deliver even faster reaction times for avid gamers, thanks to incredibly fast 480Hz panels.
